sections.title: One Mind. Many Systems.
sections.content: For decades, I've written the story of resilience ‚Äî in startups, codebases, and the chaos of the world. Every line of code, every late night, every breakthrough has been a step toward redefining what's possible.

skills.title: 10x Builder
skills.description: Relentless shipping with precision engineering. I don't just code, I architect solutions that scale.

skills.title: Self-Funded Ventures
skills.description: Bootstrapped success in fintech, AI, and infrastructure. Every dollar earned, every risk calculated.

skills.title: Battle-Tested
skills.description: Survivor of burnouts and breakthroughs. What doesn't break me makes me stronger and wiser.

skills.title: Global Defiance
skills.description: Architect of systems that challenge the status quo on a planetary scale. Think different, build different.

sections.quote: I don't subscribe to belief in markets ‚Äî I follow what unfolds
